duties_responsibilities.duty: Fill a variety of production roles including technical director/automation, audio operator/mixing, robotics/camera, chyron/graphics, and floor director.
Operate live broadcast equipment and work in a control room environment.
Think critically under pressure while broadcasting within strict time constraints and work as a cohesive team.
Interact professionally and respectfully with on-air staff, off-air staff, production and technical crews, and management.
Have a minimum of 3 years recent experience in the broadcast technician, control room/master control, and news environment in a medium to major size market.
Be able to sit and stand for an extended period, reach overhead, bend, squat, kneel, and work all shifts in a 24/7/365 breaking news environment.
